org.patrodyne.scripting.java
Class JavaCompiler

java.lang.Object
  org.patrodyne.scripting.java.JavaCompiler

public class JavaCompiler
extends Object

Simple interface to Java compiler using JSR 199 Compiler API. Modified from the original to:

  • Format source.
  • Organize imports.
  • Parameterize raw types.
  • Reference makeStringSource statically.

Author:
A. Sundararajan, Rick O'Sullivan

getSystemJavaCompiler

protected JavaCompiler getSystemJavaCompiler()
Gets the Java™ programming language compiler provided with this platform.

Returns:
The compiler provided with this platform or null if no compiler is provided

getStandardFileManager

protected StandardJavaFileManager getStandardFileManager()
Get the standard Java file manager implementation for this tool. The file manager will use the given diagnostic listener for producing any non-fatal diagnostics. Fatal errors will be signaled with the appropriate exceptions.

Returns:
A Java file manager tool.

Compile given source string and return byte codes as a memory map.

Parameters:

Returns:

compile

public Map<String,byte[]> compile(String sourceName,
                                  String source,
                                  Writer err,
                                  String sourcePath,
                                  String classPath)

Compile given source string and return byte codes as a memory map.

If the compilation fails, diagnostics are sent to the standard error stream.

Parameters:
sourceName - The file name to identify the source in diagnostics, etc.
source - The string containing the source to be compiled
err - The error writer where diagnostic messages are written.
sourcePath - The location of additional .java source files.
classPath - The location of additional .class files.
Returns:
A memory map of class name and byte code pairs or null when compilation fails.

report

protected void report(Diagnostic<?> dg,
                      PrintWriter pw)
Report a compiler diagnostic to the given print writer.

Parameters:
dg - A complier diagnostic.
pw - A print writer.

createCompilerOptions

protected List<String> createCompilerOptions(String sourcePath,
                                             String classPath)

Create Java compiler options for the given source path and class path.

Options include:

  • -Xlint:all - enable all recommended warnings.
  • -g:lines,vars - enable debugging for line numbers and local variables.
  • -sourcepath - colon separated list of paths for source code resolution.
  • -classpath - colon separated list of paths or jars for class resolution.

Parameters:
sourcePath - A colon separated list of paths for source code resolution.
classPath - A colon separated list of paths or jars for class resolution.
Returns:
A list of compiler options as individual strings.
